descripcion: One Punch Man is too strong and growing tired of his weak enemies. Will he ever be faced with a real challenge?
Genos, a Cyborg who is seeking Justice fights with a Mosquito Monster along with Saitama.
Saitama and Genos track down an evil scientist who wants to know the secret to Saitama's power.
A group of Bald thugs use body armors to terrorize rich people. Sonic Speed, a hired ninja fights them. Unfortunately he meets with Saitama who is also a Bald.
Determined to get a little recognition, Saitama decides to become a pro hero, but first, he must pass the Hero Association tests and become a full-fledged member.
To remain on the "Hero" list Saitama has to show some activity in every week. Currently the City Z is defined as the 'ghost town'. Heroes are gathered together to find out whats going on.
A giant meteor threatens to destroy City Z. All S-Rank heroes are called to City Z to destroy the meteor before its collision.
Several Sea Folk appear and begin attacking citizens. They are easily defeated until The Deep Sea King appears and defeats many heroes including an S-Class.
The fight with the Deep Sea King concludes and Saitama and Genos reflect on it as well as Saitama's promotion to B-Class.
Saitama and all class S heroes are gathered together to be informed of an imminent extremely danger threat.
An alien conqueror lands in a spaceship to conquer the Earth during the S class heroes meeting.
Saitama takes on the alien leader in epic battle as the S class heroes fight the alien warriors and destroy the spaceship.
Saitama and Genos are out shopping when they come across G4, a demonic robot on a mission to eliminate King. Meanwhile, Sitch attempts to recruit various assassins and villains.
Garou issues a declaration of war on the Hero Association through terrifying means, Hellish Blizzard gives Saitama an ultimatum, and Genos decides to eliminate his master's stalker, Speed-o'.

Garou attacks the S-rank hero Tank top Master, his followers, and Mumen Rider. Garou continues his pursuit of attacking heroes. Saitama buys a wig to join a martial arts tournament after having a brief exchange with Garou.

Assigned to guard a VIP and his son, Metal Bat couldn't be less thrilled. But when the group is suddenly attacked all hell breaks loose. Meanwhile, Saitama has disguised himself as Charanko in order to enter the "Super Fight" martial arts tournament.
Metal bat fights Garo. A lot of monsters surface around multiple cities and it is difficult for all the heroes to fight them. Meanwhile, Saitama is at the tournament and Genos is in the audience.

Saitama continues facing opponents in the tournament. Genos receives a stress signal depicting that there are 5 monsters in City C and goes to kill them. Blizzard tries to fight a monster but she turns out be very strong.
As the Super Fight tournament heads for its grand finale, the Class S heroes battle to hold back the tide of monster incursions. Meanwhile, Atomic Samurai is setting in motion a plan of his own.

Goketsu, the first Super Fight Tournament champion, arrives in the stadium. Having now become a monster, he's aiming to force the Super Fight competitors to turn into monsters themselves. When several do, it's up to Suiryu to take them on alone.
Saitama returns to the battle, but is starting to get through a gloomy state because of an obvious reason.
The Monster Association invited all of the S-Class heroes to their hideout in City Z. Meanwhile, Garo encounters a serious threat.
Garou continues his fight against the A Class heroes while some prominent S Class heroes make special entrances.
As the fight continues between Garou and his former master, Bang, a prominent threat from the Monster Association reappears.
